interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Review Date: 2019/01/26 Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Miranda Bowen', 'Jonny Campbell'], 'Producers': ['Margery Bone', 'George Faber', 'Peter Moffat', 'Mark Pybus', 'Matthew Read', 'Lucy Richer', 'Elwen Rowlands', 'Claudine Sturdy'], 'Starring': ['Jessie Buckley', 'Jeremy Neumark Jones', 'Tom Glynn-Carney'], 'Studio': ['Amazon Studios']} Review Text: This is a wonderful story that shows the human sides of war, occupation and the local people, none of whom have a choice in the matter.

The story is wonderful and takes marvelous turns. The story of the families and relationships are as compelling as the action sequences. Review Title: Outstanding! Plot and Cast are spot on! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

actual_interaction.title: Outstanding! Plot and Cast are spot on!
actual_interaction.text:
This is a wonderful story that shows the human sides of war, occupation and the local people, none of whom have a choice in the matter.

The story is wonderful and takes marvelous turns. The story of the families and relationships are as compelling as the action sequences.
